ValidationRule.description: When status is changed to "Complete" this is required to fill out before a request can be set to complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.byPass_WFRule__c = FALSE,
RecordType.Name = 'CSI Requests',
ispickval(Status__c, 'Complete'), ISBLANK( What_insights_were_found__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before you can set the request to complete, please fill out the details to what insights were found.
